artist: Engraver: James Roberts; Engraver: Henry Roberts; after Jean Baptiste Claude Chatelain
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in plate in black: [Chatelain Delin.  Printed & Sold by Hen. Roberts Engraver & Printmaker; near Hand Alley facing Turnstile Holborn London Price 6d.  J Roberts fecit in aquafort..];   on verso in black lower right corned: [E/P(?)]; in plate in pencil: [1-268]
title: Lush Landscape with Village in Distance
